baseFeats.text: You paid attention during your studies and remember the right way to attack various creatures. Choose a creature that meets the requirements. You learn the resistances, immunities, or weaknesses of the creature (your choice) without needing to successfully Recall Knowledge.

baseFeats.name: Redirect Elements
baseFeats.benefits: You seize the elemental essence of an incoming spell and redirect the spell to a creature of your choice within the spell's area.
baseFeats.text: You seize the elemental essence of an incoming spell and redirect the spell to a creature of your choice within the spell's area. The attacker rerolls the spell's attack roll against the new target.

baseFeats.name: Reverberate
baseFeats.benefits: You can manipulate the acoustics around you to deflect sonic damage back at its source.
baseFeats.text: You can manipulate the acoustics around you to deflect sonic damage back at its source. Attempt a  Performance  check against the spell DC of the creature that cast the triggering spell.  You reduce the triggering damage by an amount up to four times your level. The caster takes sonic damage equal to the amount of damage you reduced in this way.  As critical success, but you reduce the triggering damage by an amount up to twice your level.  You misdirect the sonic waves at yourself, taking twice the triggering damage.

baseFeats.name: Ricochet Feint
baseFeats.benefits: While in Ricochet Stance, you can bounce a thrown weapon off a foe to distract them.
baseFeats.text: While in Ricochet Stance, you can bounce a  thrown  weapon off a foe to distract them. You can attempt a  Feint  against a creature within the first range increment of a thrown weapon you are wielding, rather than only creatures within your melee reach.

baseFeats.name: Rugged Survivalist
baseFeats.benefits: You've studied survival skills with the School of Swords experts and are comfortable spending long periods of time in the wilderness.
baseFeats.text: You've studied survival skills with the School of Swords experts and are comfortable spending long periods of time in the wilderness. You don't get fatigued more quickly due to precipitation during overland travel, though you can otherwise be fatigued as normal. You can go 3 days + your Constitution modifier without water before you take damage from thirst and you can go 5 days + your Constitution modifier without food before you take damage from  starvation .

baseFeats.name: School Counterspell
baseFeats.benefits: Your intricate knowledge of your school lets you easily negate spells from that school.
baseFeats.text: Your intricate knowledge of your school lets you easily negate spells from that school. Instead of being able to counter a foe's spell with Counterspell only if you have the same spell prepared, if the foe casts a spell from the school matching your specialization, you can Counterspell it with any other spell of the same school.

baseFeats.name: Second Sting
baseFeats.benefits: You read your prey’s movements and transform them into openings, so failures with one weapon set up glancing blows with the other.
baseFeats.text: You read your prey’s movements and transform them into openings, so failures with one weapon set up glancing blows with the other. Make a melee Strike with one of the required weapons against your hunted prey. The Strike gains the following failure effect.   You deal the damage the other required weapon would have dealt on a hit, excluding all damage dice. (This removes dice from weapon runes, spells, and special abilities, not just weapon damage dice.)

baseFeats.name: Secrets of Shadow
baseFeats.benefits: Your shadow's voice grows ever clearer; it whispers secrets of true power to you and shields your flesh from harm.
baseFeats.text: Your shadow's voice grows ever clearer; it whispers secrets of true power to you and shields your flesh from harm. Your shadow reservoir gains an additional spell 1 level below the highest level spell you can cast, in addition to the spells it already contains for all the levels below that.  In addition, the tattoos generated by casting shadow spells protect your body against harmful energies. You gain  negative  resistance equal to the highest level of spell you can cast from spell slots; if you have  negative healing  (or are otherwise harmed by  positive  damage and not negative damage), you instead gain positive resistance in the same amount.

baseFeats.name: Sense Ki
baseFeats.benefits: You can read the presence of ki in your area.
baseFeats.text: You can read the presence of ki in your area. You gain imprecise  lifesense  out to a range of 30 feet.

baseFeats.name: Shadow Illusion
baseFeats.benefits: With an artful eye, you shape shadows into illusory forms.
baseFeats.text: With an artful eye, you shape shadows into illusory forms. You gain the  shadow illusion  focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1. You become an expert in occult spell attack rolls and DCs.

baseFeats.name: Shaped Contaminant
baseFeats.benefits: Through a combination of careful manipulation and precise breath control, you can deploy inhaled toxins precisely.
baseFeats.text: Through a combination of careful manipulation and precise breath control, you can deploy inhaled toxins precisely. When you activate an  inhaled  poison, you can cause it to fill a 20-foot line that’s 5 feet tall rather than a 10-foot cube. You gain a +3 status bonus to saving throws against inhaled poisons that you activate.

baseFeats.name: Shared Assault
baseFeats.benefits: In the triumph of battle, you can share the glory with another ally.
baseFeats.text: In the triumph of battle, you can share the glory with another ally. When the ally you chose for  Courageous Assault  critically succeeds at the Strike granted by that action, another ally affected by your  inspire courage  composition spell can immediately use a reaction to make a melee Strike. Since the second ally wasn't the ally you chose for Courageous Assault, this effect doesn't continue to a third ally, even if the second ally also critically succeeds at their Strike.

baseFeats.name: Shared Replenishment
baseFeats.benefits: When your deity blesses your warlike acts, you can extend that favor to your allies.
baseFeats.text: When your deity blesses your warlike acts, you can extend that favor to your allies. You can grant the temporary Hit Points from Replenishment of War to an ally within 10 feet instead of gaining them yourself. You can grant these temporary Hit Points to a different ally each time, meaning you might be able to grant them to multiple creatures in a single turn.

baseFeats.name: Shield Salvation
baseFeats.benefits: You can save your shield from total destruction, even after a devastating attack.
baseFeats.text: You can save your shield from total destruction, even after a devastating attack. If a shield would be destroyed due to damage taken during your  Shield Block , the shield remains intact at 1 Hit Point instead. Its construction is weakened until you take the time to repair it, preventing you from using Shield Salvation to save the same shield until your next preparations.

baseFeats.name: Shoulder Catastrophe
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve trained to protect your allies by diverting the worst attacks to yourself.
baseFeats.text: You’ve trained to protect your allies by diverting the worst attacks to yourself. The enemy doesn’t double the damage from the triggering Strike but instead applies the normal damage to both you and your ally. Both of you take any effects that would happen on a hit that dealt damage, such as poison, but neither of you are subject to any effects that would happen only on a critical success.

baseFeats.name: Side by Side (Ranger)
baseFeats.benefits: You and your animal companion fight in tandem, distracting your foes and keeping them of balance.
baseFeats.text: You and your animal companion fight in tandem, distracting your foes and keeping them off balance. Whenever you and your animal companion are adjacent to the same foe, you are both flanking that foe with each other, regardless of your actual positions.

baseFeats.name: Signifer Armor Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve spent enough time helping your comrades equip medium and heavy armor that you spread your own expertise to those armors as well.
baseFeats.text: You’ve spent enough time helping your comrades equip medium and heavy armor that you spread your own expertise to those armors as well. If you have expert proficiency in any armor or unarmored defense, you also gain expert proficiency in medium and heavy armor.

baseFeats.name: Silver's Refrain
baseFeats.benefits: Learn the silver's refrain composition cantrip.
baseFeats.text: You learn the  silver’s refrain  composition cantrip, which aids you when fighting  devils .

baseFeats.name: Sing to the Steel
baseFeats.benefits: You strike magical tones that can turn the tide of combat.
baseFeats.text: You strike magical tones that can turn the tide of combat. You and your allies within 30 feet gain the effects of one of the following runes until the end of your next turn:  corrosive ,  disrupting ,  flaming ,  frost ,  ghost touch ,  shock , or  thundering . The effects apply to a single weapon the creature is holding or one of the creature's  unarmed  attacks. You choose the rune and the effect applies to all creatures. You can use an action, which has the  concentrate  trait, to extend the duration of the rune for 1 additional round up to a maximum of 1 minute. If this would give a weapon or unarmed attack more property runes than its normal maximum, an existing property rune (as the creature chooses) is suppressed until the spell ends.

baseFeats.name: Speaking Sky
baseFeats.benefits: You can hear air movement like soft whispers.
baseFeats.text: You can hear air movement like soft whispers. You gain the  speaking sky  ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

baseFeats.name: Spellmaster's Resilience
baseFeats.benefits: Your experience with a specific type of harmful magic makes you more resistant to it.
baseFeats.text: Your experience with a specific type of harmful magic makes you more resistant to it. Choose a magical tradition (arcane, divine, occult, or primal). You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells and effects with that tradition’s trait and resistance 5 to all damage from spells and effects with that tradition’s trait. The effect must have actually been cast or created with that tradition, rather than simply being on that tradition’s spell list.

baseFeats.name: Spirit's Wrath
baseFeats.benefits: You call forth an ephemeral apparition.
baseFeats.text: You call forth an ephemeral apparition, typically the ghost of an ancestor or a nature spirit, which takes the form of a wisp. The spirit wisp makes a melee wisp rush unarmed attack against an enemy within 120 feet of you. The wisp’s attack modifier is equal to your proficiency bonus for martial weapons plus your Strength modifier plus a +2 item bonus, and it applies the same circumstance and status bonuses and penalties that you have. On a hit, the wisp deals damage equal to 4d8 plus your Constitution modifier. The damage is your choice of negative or positive damage; don’t apply your Rage damage or your weapon specialization damage, but circumstance and status bonuses and penalties that would also affect the wisp’s damage apply. If your wisp’s Strike is a critical hit, the target becomes frightened 1. This attack uses and counts toward your multiple attack penalty as if you were the one attacking.

baseFeats.name: Splendid Companion
baseFeats.benefits: Your animal companion continues to develop.
baseFeats.text: Your animal companion continues to develop. It becomes a  nimble  or  savage  animal companion (your choice), gaining abilities determined by its type. Increase its proficiency rank in  Performance  to master instead of  Athletics  or  Acrobatics .

baseFeats.name: Spring Attack
baseFeats.benefits: Springing away from one foe, you Strike at another.
baseFeats.text: Springing away from one foe, you Strike at another. Stride up to your Speed, but you must end that movement within melee reach of a different enemy. At the end of your movement, make a melee Strike against an enemy now within reach. You can use Spring Attack while Burrowing, Climbing, Flying, or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.

baseFeats.name: Spring from the Shadows
baseFeats.benefits: Leaping out from hiding, you assail your target when they least expect it.
baseFeats.text: Leaping out from hiding, you assail your target when they least expect it. You Stride up to your Speed, but you must end your movement next to an enemy you’re hidden from or undetected by. You then Strike that enemy; you remain hidden from or undetected by that creature until after you Strike. You can use Spring from the Shadows while Burrowing, Climbing, Flying, or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.

baseFeats.name: Stance Savant (Monk)
baseFeats.benefits: You enter a stance without a thought.
baseFeats.text: You enter a stance without a thought. Use an action that has the stance trait.

baseFeats.name: Student of the Dueling Arts
baseFeats.benefits: You have studied a great many combat techniques, which you can review each day.
baseFeats.text: You have studied a great many combat techniques, which you can review each day. During your daily preparations, you can swap out any number of your duelist archetype feats for other duelist archetype feats of the appropriate level for which you are qualified. You can't swap out  Duelist Dedication  or Student of the Dueling Arts in this way.  In addition, you can enter a stance from a duelist archetype feat you don't have (such as one listed under Additional Feats) by increasing the number of actions it takes to enter the stance by 1 (typically to 2 actions). You must still meet the feat's prerequisites.

baseFeats.name: Summoner's Call
baseFeats.benefits: In a moment of danger, you call your eidolon to your side.
baseFeats.text: In a moment of danger, you call your eidolon to your side. Your eidolon teleports to an open space adjacent to you.  This feat has the trait matching your eidolon's tradition ( arcane ,  divine ,  occult , or  primal ).

baseFeats.name: Sunder Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You draw upon your superstitious fury to destroy a spell.
baseFeats.text: You draw upon your superstitious fury to destroy a spell. Make a Strike with a melee weapon or an unarmed attack against a creature, object, or a spell manifestation (such as the wall created by  wall of fire  or the guardian from  spiritual guardian ). If your Strike hits, you can attempt to  counteract  a single spell or magical effect on the target. Your counteract level for this attempt is equal to half your level rounded up, and you use the result of your attack roll for the counteract check.  Whether or not you succeed at your Strike, the target becomes temporarily immune to your Sunder Spell for 24 hours.

baseFeats.name: Swap Investment
baseFeats.benefits: Your time as a Pathfinder has taught you how to improvise, and you've learned to make use of the resources you find in the field.
baseFeats.text: Your time as a Pathfinder has taught you how to improvise, and you've learned to make use of the resources you find in the field. You Invest a magic item and remove a previously invested item. The previous item no longer counts against your limit of 10 invested items.

baseFeats.name: Tense Negotiator
baseFeats.benefits: You often find that the best way to win a conflict means avoiding a fight in the first place.
baseFeats.text: You often find that the best way to win a conflict means avoiding a fight in the first place. You're good at talking to potential opponents without making things worse. If you would critically fail at a check to  Make an Impression , you instead fail. You can attempt checks to make  Requests  of creatures who're  indifferent  or  unfriendly  toward you.

baseFeats.name: Titan's Stature
baseFeats.benefits: You grow to even greater size.
baseFeats.text: You grow to even greater size. When using  Giant’s Stature , you can instead become Huge (increasing your reach by 10 feet if you were Medium or smaller) while you are raging. You have the  clumsy 1  condition as long as you are Huge.

baseFeats.name: Towering Size
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon becomes even bigger.
baseFeats.text: Your eidolon becomes even bigger. It becomes Huge, instead of Large, and the  reach  on all its attacks increases to 15 feet.

baseFeats.name: Unbalancing Sweep
baseFeats.benefits: You make a great sweep about yourself, knocking creatures off their feet and away from you.
baseFeats.text: You make a great sweep about yourself, knocking creatures off their feet and away from you. Choose up to three adjacent foes and choose whether to  Shove  or  Trip  all three of them. Whichever of the two options you choose, roll a separate  Athletics  check against each foe, performing the same action against each foe. Each attempt counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but don't increase your penalty until you have made all the attempts.

baseFeats.name: Uncanny Bombs
baseFeats.benefits: You lob bombs unerringly, despite obstructions or distance.
baseFeats.text: You lob bombs unerringly, despite obstructions or distance. When you throw an alchemical item with the  bomb  trait, its range increment increases to 60 feet, you reduce any circumstance bonus to the target’s AC from cover by 1, and you automatically succeed at the flat check when targeting a concealed creature.

baseFeats.name: Uncanny Suction
baseFeats.benefits: Your limbs produce strange, sucker-like growths that allow you to adhere to walls, objects, and most other surfaces.
baseFeats.text: Your limbs produce strange, sucker-like growths that allow you to adhere to walls, objects, and most other surfaces. You gain a climb Speed equal to your half your land Speed (minimum 5 feet). If you have the  Quick Climber  feat, your climb Speed is equal to your land Speed. In addition, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC to avoid being  Disarmed .

baseFeats.name: Vernai Training
baseFeats.prereqs: Achaekek's Grip; Advanced Red Mantis Magic
baseFeats.benefits: To resurrect a creature you've slain, a spellcaster must counteract your influence on its death.
baseFeats.text: To resurrect a creature you've slain, a spellcaster must  counteract  your influence on its death. The DC of this check is equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. In addition, add two 5th-level spells to your Red Mantis assassin spellbook—both spells must be chosen from the following options:  death ward ,  drop dead ,  false vision ,  hallucination ,  illusory scene ,  mind probe , or  sending . You gain a 5th-level spell slot that you can use to prepare a spell from your Red Mantis assassin spellbook.

baseFeats.name: Wandering Oasis
baseFeats.benefits: You're surrounded by soothing energy.
baseFeats.text: You're surrounded by soothing energy. You and allies within 60 feet of you are protected from  severe environmental heat and cold . If you're legendary in  Survival , you and those allies are also protected from extreme environmental heat and cold.

baseFeats.name: Warden's Focus
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection with your surroundings grows deeper as you focus.
baseFeats.text: Your connection with your surroundings grows deeper as you focus. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you  Refocused , you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

baseFeats.name: Wave Spiral
baseFeats.benefits: You dip and spin, unleashing a wide whirlpool of water.
baseFeats.text: You dip and spin, unleashing a wide whirlpool of water. Make an  Athletics  check to  Trip  each creature standing on the ground in a 10-foot emanation. These attacks all count toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after you make all the attacks.

baseFeats.name: Wild Strider
baseFeats.benefits: Natural obstacles pose no obstacle to you.
baseFeats.text: Natural obstacles pose no obstacle to you. You gain the ranger's  wild stride  class feature. This allows you to ignore the effects of all non-magical difficult terrain, treat greater difficult terrain as merely difficult terrain, and gives you an additional benefit from Favored Terrain based on the terrain.

baseFeats.name: Wings of the Dragon
baseFeats.benefits: You can manifest draconic wings to soar through the air at great speed.
baseFeats.text: You can manifest draconic wings to soar through the air at great speed. You gain the  dragon wings  sorcerer bloodline spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. If you already have a focus pool, increase your number of Focus Points by 1.

baseFeats.name: Words of Unraveling
baseFeats.benefits: You have unlocked abstruse methods to tangle with reality itself, altering the fate of a single individual.
baseFeats.text: You have unlocked abstruse methods to tangle with reality itself, altering the fate of a single individual. Once per day as an occult innate spell, you can cast  daydreamer's curse ,  outcast's curse , or  savant's curse . At the GM's discretion, you can substitute or add additional occult curse spells of 4th level or lower to this list. You can choose a different spell from the list each time you use this ability. If you couldn't already cast occult spells, these spells use Intelligence as your spellcasting ability, and you become trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells; if you could already cast occult spells, your proficiency in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells increases to expert.

baseFeats.name: Aasimar's Mercy
baseFeats.benefits: Your celestial powers allow you to remove lesser afflictions with ease.
baseFeats.text: Your celestial powers allow you to remove lesser afflictions with ease. Each day, you can cast two 4th-level divine innate spells. You can choose from the following spells each time you cast:  remove curse ,  remove disease , and  neutralize poison .

baseFeats.name: Advanced General Training
baseFeats.benefits: Over the course of adventuring, your adaptability has let you pick up numerous useful abilities.
baseFeats.text: Over the course of adventuring, your adaptability has let you pick up numerous useful abilities. You gain a general feat of 7th level or lower. You must meet the feat's prerequisites.  You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a different feat each time.

baseFeats.name: Airy Step
baseFeats.benefits: You create a blanket of fog in a 5–foot burst centered on one corner of your space.
baseFeats.text: You create a blanket of fog in a 5–foot burst centered on one corner of your space. All creatures within that area are  concealed , and all others are concealed to them. This concealment applies to the triggering effect, and the fog lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind. After resolving the triggering effect, you Step. If an effect prevents you from Stepping, you attempt to  Escape  the effect and Step if you succeed.

baseFeats.name: Alter Resistance
baseFeats.benefits: You focus on your protean forebears to change your energy resistance.
baseFeats.text: You focus on your  protean  forebears to change your energy resistance. The energy resistance you gain from your ganzi heritage changes to match the triggering damage. This change occurs after the damage is dealt.

baseFeats.name: Ancestor's Rage
baseFeats.benefits: You transform into an enormous otherworldly hyena.
baseFeats.text: You transform into an enormous otherworldly hyena. You can cast  animal form  (canine form only) once per day as a 5th-level occult innate spell.

baseFeats.name: Ancestor's Transformation
baseFeats.benefits: You can commune with ancestor spirits to assume the form of an enormous primeval strix.
baseFeats.text: You can commune with ancestor spirits to assume the form of an enormous primeval strix. You can cast 5th-level  aerial form  as a primal innate spell once per day, but you take the form of a primeval strix, using the statistics for a bird form.

baseFeats.name: Aquatic Adaptation
baseFeats.benefits: If you and up to four other creatures are in contact with a body of water deep enough for you to fully submerge, you can spend 10 minutes adapting the creatures to that specific body of water.
baseFeats.text: If you and up to four other creatures are in contact with a body of water deep enough for you to fully submerge, you can spend 10 minutes adapting the creatures to that specific body of water. This allows them to breathe normally while within that body of water and protects them from deep ocean pressure. These effects last until the creatures are no longer in contact with that body of water or until you use this ability again, whichever comes first for each creature.

baseFeats.name: Aquatic Camouflage
baseFeats.benefits: You blend into the waves.
baseFeats.text: You blend into the waves. While fully submerged in water, as long as an observer is at least 20 feet away from you, you don't need cover from that observer to  Hide  or  Sneak .

baseFeats.name: Arcane Sight
baseFeats.prereqs: ability to cast the detect magic cantrip
baseFeats.benefits: You've trained yourself to constantly be on the lookout for magical effects, even when focusing on looking out for other things.
baseFeats.text: You've trained yourself to constantly be on the lookout for magical effects, even when focusing on looking out for other things. When you are  Searching , you also gain the benefits of  Detect Magic  unless you choose not to. See page  here  for more information about exploration activities.

baseFeats.name: Arise, ye Worthy!
baseFeats.benefits: You are descended from the valkyries who protect worthy souls, and can hold back death's grasp.
baseFeats.text: You are descended from the valkyries who protect worthy souls, and can hold back death's grasp. You can cast  breath of life  as a divine innate spell once per day.

baseFeats.name: Augment Senses
baseFeats.benefits: You open vestigial eyes, unfurl tympanic flaps of skin, or otherwise enhance your senses.
baseFeats.text: You open vestigial eyes, unfurl tympanic flaps of skin, or otherwise enhance your senses. Until the start of your next turn, you gain the following benefits: you can't be flanked; when you  Seek  for creatures, you can scan a 60-foot cone or a 30-foot burst instead of the normal area; and when you Seek for hidden objects, you can search a 15-foot square instead of the normal area.

baseFeats.name: Avenge Ally
baseFeats.benefits: Though you know that you will eventually outlive your companions, seeing them at death's door brings clarity to your attacks.
baseFeats.text: Though you know that you will eventually outlive your companions, seeing them at death's door brings clarity to your attacks. Make a Strike. Roll twice on the attack roll and use the higher result.

baseFeats.name: Azarketi Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Your mastery with weapons both above and below water is unmatched.
baseFeats.text: Your mastery with weapons both above and below water is unmatched. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in  crossbows ,  hand crossbows ,  longspears ,  spears ,  tridents , and all  azarketi  weapons in which you are trained.

baseFeats.name: Black Cat Curse
baseFeats.benefits: You hiss a spiteful curse at the creature.
baseFeats.text: You hiss a spiteful curse at the creature. The target must reroll the triggering saving throw and use the worse result.

baseFeats.name: Bone Investiture
baseFeats.benefits: You encase yourself in spiritual dinosaur bones to become a Huge dinosaur.
baseFeats.text: You encase yourself in spiritual dinosaur bones to become a Huge dinosaur. You can cast  dinosaur form  on yourself as a 5th-level primal innate spell once per day.

baseFeats.name: Bounce Back
baseFeats.benefits: You recover from near-death experiences with astounding resilience.
baseFeats.text: You recover from near-death experiences with astounding resilience. Don't increase the value of your  wounded  condition due to losing the dying condition.

baseFeats.name: Calaca's Showstopper
baseFeats.benefits: You've spent many an evening learning songs and tales featuring calacas, death's wandering minstrels.
baseFeats.text: You've spent many an evening learning songs and tales featuring calacas, death's wandering minstrels. You dramatically unleash a stunning blast of sound by smashing an instrument you hold or belting out a discordant note. This has the effects of  synaptic pulse , but the effect is  auditory  rather than  mental . The DC is either your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

baseFeats.name: Call of the Green Man
baseFeats.benefits: You can call forth nearby nature spirits to augment your body.
baseFeats.text: You can call forth nearby nature spirits to augment your body. Once per day, you can cast  plant form  as a 5th-level primal innate spell. When you reach 17th level, this spell can be heightened to 6th level.

baseFeats.name: Can't Fall Here
baseFeats.benefits: You physically help an ally remain standing and encourage them to push through their pain against dire odds.
baseFeats.text: You physically help an ally remain standing and encourage them to push through their pain against dire odds. Your ally doesn't fall  unconscious  and remains at 1 Hit Point. The ally also gains a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last for 1 minute. Fighting onward with such an injury isn't without consequence; your ally's  wounded  condition increases by 1.

baseFeats.name: Caterwaul
baseFeats.benefits: You give a daring yowl in the face of adversity, calling your companion back from the brink of unconsciousness.
baseFeats.text: You give a daring yowl in the face of adversity, calling your companion back from the brink of unconsciousness. Your ally isn't knocked out and remains at 1 Hit Point. Your ally's  wounded  condition still increases by 1 as though they had been  dying  and recovered.

baseFeats.name: Catfolk Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: You are well-trained in traditional catfolk weapons
baseFeats.text: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank in all weapons you are trained in from Catfolk Weapon Familiarity.

baseFeats.name: Ceaseless Shadows
baseFeats.benefits: You excel at going unnoticed, especially among a crowd.
baseFeats.text: You excel at going unnoticed, especially among a crowd. You no longer need to have cover or be  concealed  to  Hide  or  Sneak . If you would have lesser cover from creatures, you gain cover and can  Take Cover , and if you would have cover from creatures, you gain greater cover.

baseFeats.name: Celestial Strikes
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to good arms all your attacks against forces of evil.
baseFeats.text: Your connection to good arms all your attacks against forces of evil. All your weapon and unarmed Strikes deal 1 additional good damage and have the  good  and  magical  traits.

baseFeats.name: Ceremony of Growth
baseFeats.benefits: You can alter your exoskeleton's size.
baseFeats.text: You can alter your exoskeleton's size. You constantly gain the effects of  enlarge . You can dismiss or resume these effects as an action, which has the  concentrate  trait.

baseFeats.name: Cloak of Poison
baseFeats.benefits: You secrete a cloak of concentrated poison that harms any who dare attack you.
baseFeats.text: You secrete a cloak of concentrated poison that harms any who dare attack you. For 1 minute, any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or melee weapon without the  reach  trait takes 3d6 poison damage.

baseFeats.name: Cobble Dancer
baseFeats.benefits: You know how to take advantage of foes thrown off-balance by unstable flooring, loose cobblestones, or similar impediments.
baseFeats.text: You know how to take advantage of foes thrown off-balance by unstable flooring, loose cobblestones, or similar impediments. While in an outdoor urban environment, you can Step into difficult terrain and enemies in difficult terrain are flat-footed to you.

baseFeats.name: Conrasu Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency for conrasu weapons.
baseFeats.text: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency for  composite shortbow ,  glaive ,  longspear ,  longsword ,  shortbow ,  spear , and all  conrasu  weapons in which you are trained.

baseFeats.name: Consistent Surge
baseFeats.benefits: Your nanites are incredibly effective, capable of improving your body's efficiency regularly.
baseFeats.text: Your nanites are incredibly effective, capable of improving your body's efficiency regularly. You can use Nanite Surge with a frequency of once per 10 minutes, rather than once per hour.

baseFeats.name: Continuous Assault
baseFeats.benefits: You can use Elemental Assault once per hour instead of once per day.
baseFeats.text: You can use Elemental Assault once per hour instead of once per day.

baseFeats.name: Daywalker
baseFeats.benefits: Whether through painstaking exposure, devoted prayer, or simple luck, you've found a greater affinity for life through the sun's light.
baseFeats.text: Whether through painstaking exposure, devoted prayer, or simple luck, you've found a greater affinity for life through the sun's light. When in an area of direct natural sunlight, your  negative healing  is suppressed, meaning you are healed by  positive   healing  effects and harmed by negative energy.

baseFeats.name: Delver
baseFeats.benefits: Subterranean life taught you to swim through the ground like water.
baseFeats.text: Subterranean life taught you to swim through the ground like water. You gain a burrow Speed of 10 feet through loose soil or dirt.

baseFeats.name: Dire Form
baseFeats.benefits: Your hybrid shape is a hulking beast.
baseFeats.text: Your hybrid shape is a hulking beast. While in your hybrid shape, you gain the effects of  enlarge .

baseFeats.name: Dwarven Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Your dwarven affinity blends with your training, granting you great skill with dwarven weapons.
baseFeats.text: Your dwarven affinity blends with your training, granting you great skill with dwarven weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency for  battle axes ,  picks ,  warhammers , and all  dwarven  weapons in which you are trained.

baseFeats.name: Eclectic Sword Mastery
baseFeats.benefits: You instinctively learn how to use a sword with just a few practice swings.
baseFeats.text: You instinctively learn how to use a sword with just a few practice swings. You change one of the swords designated in your  Tengu Weapon Familiarity  to a new one that you're wielding, provided the sword meets the specifications of Tengu Weapon Familiarity. You can Interact to draw a sword as part of this activity, designating the sword as part of drawing it; disrupting that Interact action prevents you from designating it as one of your swords. This designation lasts until your next daily preparations.

baseFeats.name: Elite Dracomancer
baseFeats.benefits: Your magic rivals that of lesser dragons.
baseFeats.text: Your magic rivals that of lesser dragons. Choose one 3rd-level spell and one 4th-level spell from those listed for a dragon spellcaster of your draconic exemplar's type (such as  paralyze  and  stinking cloud  for a  black dragon  exemplar). Links to all types of dragons can be found  here . You can cast each of these spells once per day as arcane innate spells.

baseFeats.name: Elven Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Your elven affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with elven weapons.
baseFeats.text: Your elven affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with elven weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in  longbows ,  composite longbows ,  longswords ,  rapiers ,  shortbows ,  composite shortbows , and all elf weapons in which you are trained.

baseFeats.name: Enforced Order
baseFeats.benefits: You never fail to strike down the ever-expanding reaches of chaos.
baseFeats.text: You never fail to strike down the ever-expanding reaches of chaos. All your weapon and unarmed Strikes deal 1 additional lawful damage and have the  lawful  and  magical  traits.

baseFeats.name: Envenomed Edge
baseFeats.benefits: With a combination of your poison glands and herbal concoctions, you can consistently deliver venomous attacks when you hit an enemy's weak points.
baseFeats.text: With a combination of your poison glands and herbal concoctions, you can consistently deliver venomous attacks when you hit an enemy's weak points. When you critically hit using a Strike with a weapon or unarmed attack and deal slashing or piercing damage with that Strike, you deal an additional 1d4  persistent poison damage  to your target.

baseFeats.name: Ferocious Beasts
baseFeats.prereqs: Beast Trainer or animal companion; Orc Ferocity
baseFeats.benefits: Since ancient times, the mightiest orc beast tamers would draw out the true fighting spirit of their companion beasts by feeding the creatures a draft incorporating the orc's own blood.
baseFeats.text: Since ancient times, the mightiest orc beast tamers would draw out the true fighting spirit of their companion beasts by feeding the creatures a draft incorporating the orc's own blood. Animal companions or bonded animals you have gain the Orc Ferocity feat, and they gain a reaction they can use only for Orc Ferocity. If you have the Undying Ferocity ancestry feat, all animal companions or bonded animals you have also gain the benefits of that feat when using the Orc Ferocity reaction.

baseFeats.name: Fey Skin
baseFeats.benefits: While you are more susceptible to cold iron than most of the Wingless, you also have an incredible resilience and a deeper connection to the healing energies of the First World.
baseFeats.text: While you are more susceptible to  cold iron  than most of the Wingless, you also have an incredible resilience and a deeper connection to the healing energies of the  First World . Increase your maximum Hit Points by an amount equal to your level. If you rest for 10 minutes, brilliant light from the First World seeps into your form from your wings (or the spot where your wings would be), causing you to regain a number of Hit Points equal to your level; this is cumulative with any Hit Points you regain from  Treat Wounds . However, you gain weakness 5 to cold iron.

baseFeats.name: Fiendish Strikes
baseFeats.benefits: Your festering connection to the forces of evil infuses your weapons with debilitating malevolence, tearing down creatures of good with every attack.
baseFeats.text: Your festering connection to the forces of evil infuses your weapons with debilitating malevolence, tearing down creatures of good with every attack. All your weapon and unarmed Strikes deal 1 additional evil damage and have the  evil  and  magical  traits.

baseFeats.name: Fiend's Door
baseFeats.benefits: Like many fiends, you have the supernatural ability to teleport yourself to safety.
baseFeats.text: Like many fiends, you have the supernatural ability to teleport yourself to safety. Once per day, you can cast  dimension door  as a 5th-level divine innate spell.

baseFeats.name: Finest Trick
baseFeats.benefits: Many fiends—rakshasa rajas and demonic succubi most famously—can take on the forms of others.
baseFeats.text: Many fiends— rakshasa rajas  and  demonic succubi  most famously—can take on the forms of others. With practice, you can do the same. When you use Devil in Plain Sight, you can alter your appearance to match a generic member of your base ancestry, rather than one that's obviously you without your tieflings features. In addition, you can imitate a specific person's appearance (of any ancestry of the same size and kind as your base ancestry, typically a  humanoid  for most ancestries) if you consume a bit of their blood, a lock of their hair, or appropriate equivalents as part of the action. You still must know what the creature looks like, and you must be aware that the consumed portion comes from their body.

baseFeats.name: Flame Jump
baseFeats.benefits: Your peri lineage has opened your mind to fire's raw, purging essence.
baseFeats.text: Your  peri  lineage has opened your mind to fire's raw, purging essence. You can spend 1 minute in focused preparation, then enter a fire your size or larger to instantly teleport to any fire that is your size or larger up to 5 miles away. You take no damage from entering or exiting fires when using this ability. Once you enter the fire, you instantly know the rough locations of other large fires within range and can exit from the original fire, if you prefer. You can't carry  extradimensional  spaces with you when you teleport; if you attempt to do so, the activity fails.

baseFeats.name: Form of the Bat
baseFeats.benefits: You can transform into a harmless bat.
baseFeats.text: You can transform into a harmless bat. You gain the effects of a 4th-level  pest form , except you always transform into a bat.

baseFeats.name: Formation Master
baseFeats.benefits: You can assemble a formation even with members of ancestries that lack the hobgoblins’ military discipline, and you can extend these benefits to your hobgoblin allies.
baseFeats.text: You can assemble a formation even with members of ancestries that lack the hobgoblins’ military discipline, and you can extend these benefits to your hobgoblin allies. When you are adjacent to at least two humanoid allies, you gain the benefits of Formation Training, even if they aren’t hobgoblin allies. Hobgoblin allies adjacent to you and at least one other hobgoblin ally also gain the bonuses from your Formation Training feat.

baseFeats.name: Fully Flighted
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the effects of Juvenile Flight at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes.
baseFeats.text: You gain the effects of Juvenile Flight at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes. This includes the status bonus to your Speed if you have  Fledgling Flight .

baseFeats.name: Genie Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in falchions, ranseurs, scimitars, tridents, and all geniekin weapons in which you are trained.
baseFeats.text: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in  falchions ,  ranseurs ,  scimitars ,  tridents , and all  geniekin  weapons in which you are trained.

baseFeats.name: Gift of the Moon
baseFeats.benefits: You can share your power with others, but they can't escape the werecreature's curse as easily as you can.
baseFeats.text: You can share your power with others, but they can't escape the werecreature's curse as easily as you can. You can cast a 5th-level  moon frenzy  as a primal innate spell once per day. At 15th level, you cast a 6th-level   instead. At 17th level, your 6th-level   grants its standard effects, except the temporary Hit Points increase to 15 and the silver weakness increases to 15. At 20th level, you cast a 10th-level   instead. The spell uses your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

baseFeats.name: Gnoll Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: You fight with effortless expertise with gnoll weapons.
baseFeats.text: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in  flails ,  khopeshes ,  mambeles ,  spears , and  war flails .

baseFeats.name: Gnome Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Your gnome affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with gnome weapons.
baseFeats.text: Your gnome affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with gnome weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the  glaive ,  kukri , and all  gnome  weapons in which you are trained.

baseFeats.name: Goblin Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Your goblin affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with goblin weapons.
baseFeats.text: Your goblin affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with goblin weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the  dogslicer ,  horsechopper , and all  goblin  weapons in which you are trained.

baseFeats.name: Grippli Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: You fight with effortless expertise with grippli weapons.
baseFeats.text: You fight with effortless expertise with grippli weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the  blowgun ,  hatchet ,  scythe ,  shortbow ,  composite shortbow , or  grippli  weapons in which you are trained.

baseFeats.name: Hag Magic
baseFeats.benefits: Through your heritage, you can replicate some of a hag's magic.
baseFeats.text: Through your heritage, you can replicate some of a hag's magic. Choose one common spell of 4th level or lower from those available to a coven, including the spells contributed to a coven by a hag of your mother's type. You can cast this spell once per day as a 4th-level occult innate spell.  Spells available to all covens are  augury ,  charm ,  clairaudience ,  clairvoyance ,  dream message , and  illusory disguise . The eligible spells granted by the most prominent types of hag are:    acid arrow ,  water walk ;    entangle ,  outcast's curse ,  wall of thorns ;    earthbind ;    nightmare

baseFeats.name: Halfling Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Your halfling affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with halfling weapons.
baseFeats.text: Your halfling affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with halfling weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the  sling ,  halfling sling staff ,  shortsword , and all  halfling  weapons in which you are trained.

baseFeats.name: Harbinger's Caw
baseFeats.benefits: You caw ominously, cursing the creature with misfortune.
baseFeats.text: You caw ominously, cursing the creature with misfortune. The target creature must roll the triggering check twice and take the lower result.

baseFeats.name: Hatchling Flight
baseFeats.benefits: You can fly a little!
baseFeats.text: You can fly a little! You Fly up to half your Speed. If you don't end your movement on solid ground, you fall at the end of your turn.

baseFeats.name: Hobgoblin Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: You increase your training in battlefield weapons.
baseFeats.text: You increase your training in battlefield weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank in all weapons you are trained in from Hobgoblin Weapon Familiarity.

baseFeats.name: Hydraulic Maneuvers
baseFeats.benefits: You batter your foes with a torrent of water siphoned from your surroundings.
baseFeats.text: You batter your foes with a torrent of water siphoned from your surroundings. If the next action you take is an  Athletics  check to  Disarm ,  Shove , or  Trip , that action has a range of 15 feet. You don't receive any item bonuses to that check or any circumstance bonuses related to your physical body, but if you roll a critical failure on that Athletics check, you get a failure instead.

baseFeats.name: Impose Order
baseFeats.benefits: You shift the underlying fabric of reality to impose a baseline of order.
baseFeats.text: You shift the underlying fabric of reality to impose a baseline of order. If the trigger was a skill check, you instead receive a result of 10 + your proficiency bonus (don't apply any other bonuses, penalties, or modifiers). If the trigger was an effect with the misfortune trait, the misfortune and fortune effects cancel each other out as normal, negating the triggering misfortune effect.

baseFeats.name: Improved Elemental Bulwark
baseFeats.benefits: You gain resistance 10 from Elemental Bulwark instead of 5.
baseFeats.text: You gain resistance 10 from Elemental Bulwark instead of 5.

baseFeats.name: Incredible Ferocity
baseFeats.benefits: Given time to collect yourself after a near-death scrape, you can rebuild your ferocity and withstand additional finishing blows.
baseFeats.text: Given time to collect yourself after a near-death scrape, you can rebuild your ferocity and withstand additional finishing blows. You can use  Orc Ferocity  with a frequency of once per hour, rather than once per day.

baseFeats.name: Incredible Luck (Halfling)
baseFeats.benefits: Even other halflings consider you to be particularly lucky.
baseFeats.text: Even other halflings consider you to be particularly lucky. You can use Halfling Luck once per hour, rather than once per day. If you have  Guiding Luck , you can still use Halfling Luck when you fail a Perception check or attack roll only once per day (though you can use it within the same hour that you used Halfling Luck), and if you have  Shared Luck , you can still use Halfling Luck on an ally instead of yourself only once per day.

baseFeats.name: Inspirit Hazard
baseFeats.benefits: You awaken a spirit of creation within the hazard.
baseFeats.text: You awaken a spirit of creation within the hazard. You learn the hazard's effects. Once in the next 10 minutes, when you observe a creature take an action that would trigger one of the hazard's reactions or free actions if you hadn't Disabled it, you can use a reaction to rearm the hazard, causing the observed creature to trigger it immediately.

baseFeats.name: Instinctive Obfuscation
baseFeats.prereqs: at least one arcane or occult innate spell gained from a gnome heritage or gnome ancestry feat
baseFeats.benefits: The magic within you manifests as a natural reaction to threats.
baseFeats.text: The magic within you manifests as a natural reaction to threats. You gain the effects of  mirror image  but with two images instead of three. The tradition of this action matches the tradition of your gnome ancestry options.

baseFeats.name: Invisible Trickster
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned how to become invisible and remain so.
baseFeats.text: You have learned how to become invisible and remain so. You can cast 4th-level  invisibility  as a primal innate spell once per hour.

baseFeats.name: Irriseni Ice-Witch
baseFeats.benefits: You can trace your direct descent from one of the Queens of Irrisen and thus from Baba Yaga herself.
baseFeats.text: You can trace your direct descent from one of the Queens of Irrisen and thus from Baba Yaga herself. Your resistance to cold increases to 5 + half your level, and you can cast 5th-level  wall of ice  as an innate arcane spell once per day.

baseFeats.name: Iruxi Spirit Strike
baseFeats.benefits: Your iruxi unarmed attacks channel the spiritual energy of your ancestors.
baseFeats.text: Your iruxi unarmed attacks channel the spiritual energy of your ancestors. Any unarmed attacks you acquire from iruxi heritages or ancestry feats gain the effects of a  ghost touch  property rune.

baseFeats.name: Jinx Glutton
baseFeats.benefits: You can Eat Fortune once per hour, rather than once per day.
baseFeats.text: You can Eat Fortune once per hour, rather than once per day.

baseFeats.name: Killing Stone
baseFeats.benefits: Your star orb hides a deadly miasma.
baseFeats.text: Your star orb hides a deadly miasma. You can cast 5th-level  cloudkill  as a divine innate spell once per day. The spell's normal components are replaced with a focus component (your star orb) and a somatic component to aim the orb towards the location for the spell.

baseFeats.name: Kitsune Spell Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Your tails show your magical mastery.
baseFeats.text: Your tails show your magical mastery. During your daily preparations, choose  confusion ,  death ward , or  illusory scene . You can Cast this Spell as a 5th-level divine innate spell once that day. You become an expert in divine spell DCs and divine spell attack rolls.

baseFeats.name: Kobold Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the crossbow, greatpick, light pick, pick, and spear, as well as any kobold weapons in which you are trained.
baseFeats.text: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the  crossbow ,  greatpick ,  light pick ,  pick , and  spear , as well as any  kobold  weapons in which you are trained.

baseFeats.name: Lifeblood's Call
baseFeats.benefits: The impulse to survive and continue fighting resonates deep within you.
baseFeats.text: The impulse to survive and continue fighting resonates deep within you. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage rolls on your melee Strikes equal to twice the sum of your  wounded  and  doomed  conditions (to a maximum of a +8 circumstance bonus to damage) whenever you have one or both conditions.

baseFeats.name: Mask of Fear
baseFeats.benefits: Your warmask burns off of your face, releasing your apprehension.
baseFeats.text: Your   burns off of your face, releasing your apprehension. You remove the frightened condition. Your   is destroyed, and you can't reapply it until your next daily preparations.  You can use this reaction even if you have a condition tied to the frightened condition that would normally prevent you from using a reaction, such as “ fleeing  as long as you're frightened” or “ paralyzed  as long as you're frightened.”

baseFeats.name: Metal-Veined Strikes
baseFeats.benefits: Metallic veins grow throughout your body, giving your unarmed attacks a metallic sheen.
baseFeats.text: Metallic veins grow throughout your body, giving your unarmed attacks a metallic sheen. Choose either  cold iron  or  silver . Your unarmed attacks are treated as the chosen type of metal.

baseFeats.name: Mischievous Tail
baseFeats.benefits: Your tail can bedevil your foes.
baseFeats.text: Your tail can bedevil your foes. You can  Disarm  and  Trip  creatures with your tail, even if you don't have a free hand. All restrictions of Skillful Tail otherwise continue to apply. If you have  Smashing Tail , your tail unarmed attack gains the  disarm  and  trip  traits.

baseFeats.name: Mist Strider
baseFeats.benefits: You condense the moisture in the air, solidifying it so it can hold your weight.
baseFeats.text: You condense the moisture in the air, solidifying it so it can hold your weight. When you use Water Strider, you can walk on air. You can ascend and descend at a maximum of a 45-degree angle. You still fall at the end of your movement if you don't end on a surface that can support you, as normal for Water Strider.

baseFeats.name: None Shall Know
baseFeats.benefits: Even magical means have a hard time prying information from you.
baseFeats.text: Even magical means have a hard time prying information from you. You gain  nondetection  as an innate occult spell once per day, which can only be cast on yourself and is automatically heightened to half your level rounded up.

baseFeats.name: One with Earth
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to harness your connection to the earth to travel through it.
baseFeats.text: You've learned to harness your connection to the earth to travel through it. You gain a burrow Speed of 15 feet.

baseFeats.name: Orc Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Your orc affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with orc weapons.
baseFeats.text: Your orc affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with orc weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the  falchion , the  greataxe , and all  orc  weapons in which you are trained.

baseFeats.name: Primal Rampage
baseFeats.benefits: You tap into the unstoppable, primeval strength of your ancient kin.
baseFeats.text: You tap into the unstoppable, primeval strength of your ancient kin. You gain  freedom of movement  and  stoneskin  as 4th-level primal innate spells that you can cast once per day. As a 3-action activity, you can Cast a Spell twice to cast both of these innate spells, as long as they are both still available for the day.

baseFeats.name: Purge Sins
baseFeats.benefits: You call on your celestial forebears to rid your body of all toxins and impurities.
baseFeats.text: You call on your celestial forebears to rid your body of all toxins and impurities. For each  disease  or  poison  currently affecting you, attempt a  Religion  check to  counteract  that disease or poison. As normal, your counteract level is equal to half your level, rounded up.

baseFeats.name: Radiant Burst
baseFeats.benefits: Your skin glows with intensity.
baseFeats.text:
Your skin glows with intensity. Creatures within 10 feet who can see you must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.  The creature is unaffected.  The creature is  dazzled  for 1 round.  The creature is  blinded  for 1 round and dazzled for 4 rounds.
  The creature is blinded for 4 rounds and dazzled for 10 minutes.

baseFeats.name: Rehydration
baseFeats.benefits: You surround your body with a thin layer of water drawn from the moisture in the air.
baseFeats.text: You surround your body with a thin layer of water drawn from the moisture in the air. You can spend one hour resting to rehydrate your gills and skin, which counts as submerging your body in water. At the GM's discretion, incredibly dry areas, such as deserts, might not have enough moisture in the air for your Rehydration to work.

baseFeats.name: Resist Ruin
baseFeats.benefits: Your duskwalker heritage allows you to extend protection against negative energy to yourself or an ally in need.
baseFeats.text: Your duskwalker heritage allows you to extend protection against negative energy to yourself or an ally in need. You gain resistance 5 to negative energy, and once per day, you can cast  death ward  as a divine innate spell.

baseFeats.name: Revivification Protocal
baseFeats.benefits: Your nanites are programmed to automatically revive you.
baseFeats.text: Your nanites are programmed to automatically revive you. You're restored to 1 Hit Point, lose the dying and  unconscious  conditions, and can act normally on this turn. You gain or increase the  wounded  condition as normal when losing the dying condition in this way.

baseFeats.name: Secret Eyes
baseFeats.benefits: You can call forth an invisible eye to let you peek on secrets.
baseFeats.text: You can call forth an invisible eye to let you peek on secrets. Once per day, you can cast  prying eye  as an innate occult spell.

baseFeats.name: See the Unseen
baseFeats.benefits: You notice things that others can't see at all.
baseFeats.text: You notice things that others can't see at all. While you're adjacent to an  undetected  creature of your level or lower, it is instead only  hidden  from you. You only need a successful DC 5 flat check to target a hidden creature.

baseFeats.name: Shadow Pact
baseFeats.benefits: Thousands of years ago, your ancestors made a pact with Zon-Kuthon.
baseFeats.text: Thousands of years ago, your ancestors made a pact with  Zon-Kuthon . He has not forgotten, even if you might wish he had. You can take 1 damage to mix blood and shadows to cast 5th-level  creation  as an innate divine spell. You can use this ability as often as you wish, but you can have only one such object in existence at a time. If the object encounters bright light, the spell ends and the object dissolves into shadows.

baseFeats.name: Shadow's Assault
baseFeats.benefits: Your shadow assaults your foes.
baseFeats.text: Your shadow assaults your foes. You can cast  shadow blast  as a 5th-level occult innate spell once per day. At 17th level, your   is heightened to 6th level.

baseFeats.name: Shaitan Skin
baseFeats.benefits: When in danger, you can harden the stone in your skin into armor, much like a shaitan.
baseFeats.text: When in danger, you can harden the stone in your skin into armor, much like a  shaitan . You can cast  stoneskin  on yourself only, 3 times per day as a 4th-level arcane innate spell.

baseFeats.name: Shinstabber
baseFeats.benefits: You can dart around and between your larger allies' legs without tripping them up.
baseFeats.text: You can dart around and between your larger allies' legs without tripping them up. As long as you're Small or smaller, you can end your movement in the same square as a Medium or larger ally. Only two creatures total can share the same space when using this ability or a similar one.

baseFeats.name: Shory Aerialist
baseFeats.prereqs: Garundi ethnicity, Mauxi ethnicity, or Tian-Yae ethnicity; Shory Aeromancer or ability to cast fly
baseFeats.benefits: Unique in Golarion’s history, the Shory people developed fighting styles dedicated to combat in the air.
baseFeats.text: Unique in Golarion’s history, the Shory people developed fighting styles dedicated to combat in the air. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to  Acrobatics  checks to Maneuver in Flight and a +5-foot status bonus to your fly Speed whenever you are flying via magic.

baseFeats.name: Skirt the Light
baseFeats.benefits: You can travel the border between the Material and Shadow Planes and even bring others along.
baseFeats.text: You can travel the border between the  Material  and  Shadow Planes  and even bring others along. You can cast  shadow walk  as an occult innate spell once per day.

baseFeats.name: Skittering Sneak
baseFeats.benefits: You squish, slink, and skitter from cover to cover with great speed and stealth.
baseFeats.text: You squish, slink, and skitter from cover to cover with great speed and stealth. You can move up to your full Speed when you  Sneak .

baseFeats.name: Spell Devourer
baseFeats.benefits: You don't just resist magic; you devour it.
baseFeats.text: You don't just resist magic; you devour it. Whenever you succeed at a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to double the spell's level, or equal to the level if the magical effect isn't a spell. These temporary Hit Points last until the end of your next turn.

baseFeats.name: Spew Tentacles
baseFeats.benefits: You can open your mouth to an immense size and spew forth an impossibly large field of tentacles.
baseFeats.text: You can open your mouth to an immense size and spew forth an impossibly large field of tentacles. You can cast  black tentacles  once per day as an innate occult spell, though when you do so, you spew them from your mouth out to the appropriate range, where they take root and begin  Grappling  creatures as usual. The tentacles recognize you as a part of them and don't attempt to Grapple you, even if you are in the area.

baseFeats.name: Spiteful Rake
baseFeats.benefits: Your instincts sing of spite and malice, and you've learned a devastating trick: go for the eyes.
baseFeats.text: Your instincts sing of spite and malice, and you've learned a devastating trick: go for the eyes. You make a claw Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target is  dazzled  for 1 round. On a critical hit, the target is instead  blinded  for 1 round and dazzled until restored to maximum hit points.

baseFeats.name: Steadfast Ally
baseFeats.benefits: Your presence alone is enough to provide your allies with emotional support.
baseFeats.text: Your presence alone is enough to provide your allies with emotional support. You can use the  Aid  reaction to grant a bonus to another creature’s Will saving throw even when you haven’t prepared to help.

baseFeats.name: Stubborn Persistence
baseFeats.benefits: Humans are renowned for their ability to persist through the most grueling of trials.
baseFeats.text: Humans are renowned for their ability to persist through the most grueling of trials. When you would become  fatigued , attempt a DC 17 flat check. On a success, you aren't fatigued. If the fatigued condition has an underlying cause that you don't address, such as lack of rest, you must attempt the check again at an interval determined by the GM until you fail the flat check or address the underlying cause.

baseFeats.name: Suli Amir
baseFeats.benefits: You have power connected to the powerful jann amirs.
baseFeats.text: You have power connected to the powerful jann amirs. You can cast  read omens  and 4th-level  invisibility  each once per day as arcane innate spells, and you can cast  detect magic  at will as an arcane innate cantrip, heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

baseFeats.name: Summon Air Elemental
baseFeats.benefits: You have a connection to the Inner Spheres, allowing you to summon an elemental ally.
baseFeats.text: You have a connection to the Inner Spheres, allowing you to summon an elemental ally. Once per day, you can cast  summon elemental  as a 5th-level primal innate spell, but the elemental summoned must be an  air elemental .

baseFeats.name: Summon Celestial Kin
baseFeats.benefits: You have a connection to the celestial realms, allowing you to summon a celestial ally.
baseFeats.text: You have a connection to the celestial realms, allowing you to summon a celestial ally. Once per day, you can cast  summon celestial  as a 5th-level divine innate spell, but the celestial summoned must be from the same category as your own lineage, such as a creature with the  angel  trait if you are angelkin.

baseFeats.name: Summon Earth Elemental
baseFeats.benefits: You have a connection to the Inner Sphere, allowing you to summon an elemental ally.
baseFeats.text: You have a connection to the Inner Sphere, allowing you to summon an elemental ally. Once per day, you can cast  summon elemental  as a 5th-level primal innate spell, but the elemental summoned must be an  earth elemental .

baseFeats.name: Summon Fiendish Kin
baseFeats.benefits: You have a deep connection to the fiendish realms, allowing you to summon a fiend matching your own lineage.
baseFeats.text: You have a deep connection to the fiendish realms, allowing you to summon a fiend matching your own lineage. Once per day, you can cast  summon fiend  as a 5th-level divine innate spell. The fiend you summon must match your own lineage.

baseFeats.name: Summon Fire Elemental
baseFeats.benefits: You can summon an elemental ally.
baseFeats.text: You can summon an elemental ally. Once per day, you can cast  summon elemental  as a 5th-level primal innate spell, but the elemental summoned must be a  fire elemental .

baseFeats.name: Summon Water Elemental
baseFeats.benefits: You can summon an elemental ally.
baseFeats.text: You can summon an elemental ally. Once per day, you can cast  summon elemental  as a 5th-level primal innate spell, but the elemental summoned must be a  water elemental .

baseFeats.name: Telluric Power
baseFeats.benefits: You channel strength from the earth beneath your feet to pummel your enemies.
baseFeats.text: You channel strength from the earth beneath your feet to pummel your enemies. When making a melee Strike against a target who is standing on the same earth or stone surface as you are, you gain a circumstance bonus to the damage roll equal to the number of weapon damage dice.

baseFeats.name: Tengu Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Study has made you an expert with tengu weapons.
baseFeats.text: Study has made you an expert with tengu weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency for the weapons from your Tengu Weapon Familiarity.

baseFeats.name: Thunder God's Fan
baseFeats.benefits: A wave of your fan unleashes the fury of the storm.
baseFeats.text: A wave of your fan unleashes the fury of the storm. You can Activate your   one additional time per day. Add the 5th-level  lightning bolt  spell to the spells contained within your fan.

baseFeats.name: Toppling Dance
baseFeats.benefits: While sharing a creature's space using Dance Underfoot, your weapons and unarmed attacks gain the trip trait, but only against the creature whose space you share.
baseFeats.text: While sharing a creature's space using Dance Underfoot, your weapons and unarmed attacks gain the  trip  trait, but only against the creature whose space you share. You can be in the same space as a Large or larger  prone  creature, even if it's not your ally.

baseFeats.name: Translucent Skin
baseFeats.benefits: Your body is translucent while underwater.
baseFeats.text: Your body is translucent while underwater. Whenever you are fully submerged in water, you can  Hide  from other creatures even if you don't have cover against them and aren't  concealed  from them.

baseFeats.name: Truespeech
baseFeats.benefits: It is paramount that you are understood and you understand others; language need not impede your message.
baseFeats.text: It is paramount that you are understood and you understand others; language need not impede your message. You can cast  tongues  as a 5th-level divine innate spell once per day on yourself only. You gain a +1 status bonus to  Diplomacy  checks for the duration of the spell when speaking to creatures with whom you already shared a language before casting.

baseFeats.name: Unbreakable-er Goblin
baseFeats.benefits: As hard as most unbreakable goblins are to break, you are that much harder to break.
baseFeats.text: As hard as most unbreakable goblins are to break, you are that much harder to break. You gain 20 Hit Points from your ancestry instead of 10. When you fall, you take no falling damage. If you have the  Bouncy Goblin  feat, after falling or jumping from a height of at least 20 feet, you can bounce back into the air, up to half the distance you fell (and half as far forward if you jumped). These bounces continue until you bounce less than 20 feet.

baseFeats.name: Unconventional Expertise
baseFeats.prereqs: Unconventional Weaponry; trained in the weapon you chose for Unconventional Weaponry
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve continued to advance your powers using your unconventional weapon.
baseFeats.text: You’ve continued to advance your powers using your unconventional weapon. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the weapon you chose for  Unconventional Weaponry .

baseFeats.name: Universal Longevity
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve perfected your ability to keep up with all the skills you’ve learned over your long life.
baseFeats.text: You’ve perfected your ability to keep up with all the skills you’ve learned over your long life, so you’re almost never truly untrained at a skill. You reflect on your life experiences, changing the skills you selected with  Ancestral Longevity  and  Expert Longevity .

baseFeats.name: Unrivaled Builder
baseFeats.benefits: Building things is like solving a puzzle, and you know how to use anything at your disposal to get the job done.
baseFeats.text: Building things is like solving a puzzle, and you know how to use anything at your disposal to get the job done. You gain  creation  as a 5th-level innate primal spell. You must have an equivalent Bulk of material to create an item, such as wood or scrap metal to make a wheelbarrow. You can cast this spell once each day.

baseFeats.name: Vanth's Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Vanths themselves recognize you as an honorary reaper.
baseFeats.text: Vanths  themselves recognize you as an honorary reaper. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in  bo staves ,  longbows ,  composite longbows ,  scythes , and  staves .

baseFeats.name: Very, Very Sneaky
baseFeats.benefits: Your ability to hide is so great, you can disappear straight from vision.
baseFeats.text: You can move up to your Speed when you use the  Sneak  action, and you no longer need to have cover or greater cover or be  concealed  to  Hide  or Sneak.

baseFeats.name: Vicious Snares
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned how to create traps that cause greater injuries.
baseFeats.text: You've learned how to create traps that cause greater injuries. You deal an additional 1d6 precision damage with damaging  snares  you craft. This increases to 2d6 additional precision damage if you're legendary in  Crafting .

baseFeats.name: Wandering Heart
baseFeats.prereqs: Arctic Elf, Cavern Elf, Desert Elf, Woodland Elf, or any other elf heritage based on adapting to an environment
baseFeats.benefits: While all elves adapt to their environments over time, you have traveled so widely and become attuned to so many environs that your body now changes more rapidly than other elves.
baseFeats.text: While all elves adapt to their environments over time, you have traveled so widely and become attuned to so many environs that your body now changes more rapidly than other elves. After spending a week in an environment associated with an elf heritage (such as snow for arctic elf, or a forest or jungle for woodland elf) your heritage automatically changes to become that heritage. This never causes you to change to an elf heritage that isn’t related to an environment, such as  ancient elf ,  seer elf , or  whisper elf .

baseFeats.name: War Conditioning
baseFeats.benefits: You have extensive training in remote environments, allowing you to move through these areas easily.
baseFeats.text: You have extensive training in remote environments, allowing you to move through these areas easily. When you gain this feat, you can choose to gain either a climb Speed of 20 feet or a swim Speed of 20 feet.

baseFeats.name: Warren Digger
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to put your sturdy claws to work digging through the earth.
baseFeats.text: You've learned to put your sturdy claws to work digging through the earth. You gain a burrow Speed of 15 feet.

baseFeats.name: We March On
baseFeats.benefits: You make sure that your allies push themselves while traveling.
baseFeats.text: You make sure that your allies push themselves while traveling. You gain the  Caravan Leader  and  Pick Up the Pace  general feats, even if you don't meet the prerequisites.

baseFeats.name: Webslinger
baseFeats.benefits: Your natural ability to create silken webs blends with your magical powers, allowing you to create impossibly large webs with great frequency.
baseFeats.text: Your natural ability to create silken webs blends with your magical powers, allowing you to create impossibly large webs with great frequency. This has the effects of a 2nd-level  web  spell using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

baseFeats.name: Absorb Spell
baseFeats.prereqs: Spellmaster Dedication; spell repertoire or ability to prepare spells
baseFeats.benefits: You absorb a spell and store it in your body.
baseFeats.text: You absorb a spell and store it in your body. If you are a spontaneous spellcaster, you can cast the triggering spell once during the next 10 minutes, even if it’s not on your spell list as if it were in your repertoire. If you are a prepared spellcaster, you can replace one of your prepared spells of the same level with the absorbed spell, but you must cast the absorbed spell within 10 minutes or you lose that spell slot for the day. You cast the spell at the same spell level as the spell you absorbed, but the spell is of your magical tradition and uses your spell DC, spell attack roll, and other statistics to determine its effects.

baseFeats.name: Airborne Form
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon can fly.
baseFeats.text: Your eidolon can fly. It gains a fly Speed equal to its Speed.

baseFeats.name: Allegro
baseFeats.benefits: You can quicken your allies with a fast-paced performance.
baseFeats.text: You can quicken your allies with a fast-paced performance. You learn the  allegro  composition cantrip.

baseFeats.name: Anchoring Aura
baseFeats.benefits: Your aura hampers fiends’ teleportation.
baseFeats.text: Your aura hampers fiends’ teleportation. Your aura attempts to counteract teleportation spells cast by fiends within 15 feet, using the spell level and DC of your devotion spells.

baseFeats.name: Arcane Shroud
baseFeats.benefits: Your spell has a powerful aftereffect, briefly granting you a certain spell depending on the spell you cast.
baseFeats.text: Your spell has a powerful aftereffect, briefly granting you a certain spell depending on the spell you cast. You use Arcane Cascade and are subject to an additional aftereffect spell depending on the school of your most recent spell. This aftereffect spell's duration lasts until the end of your next turn or its normal duration, whichever is longer. Using Arcane Shroud again ends any existing spell you gained from Arcane Shroud.  Abjuration stoneskin Conjuration blink Divination see invisibility Enchantment heroism Evocation fire shield Illusion invisibility (ends after a hostile action, as normal) Necromancy false life Transmutation fleet step

baseFeats.name: Armored Exercise
baseFeats.prereqs: Swordmaster Dedication; trained in light, medium, or heavy armor
baseFeats.benefits: You've spent time training in your armor alongside other agents from the Swords.
baseFeats.text: You've spent time training in your armor alongside other agents from the Swords. Your proficiency rank for light, medium, and heavy armor increases to expert for whichever of those you already had the trained proficiency rank in.

baseFeats.name: Aura of Life
baseFeats.benefits: Your aura protects against necromantic effects.
baseFeats.text: Your aura protects against necromantic effects. You and all allies within 15 feet gain resistance 5 to negative energy and a +1 status bonus to saves against necromancy effects.

baseFeats.name: Aura of Preservation
baseFeats.benefits: Your aura protects against the twisting powers of aberrations.
baseFeats.text: Your aura protects against the twisting powers of  aberrations . You and all allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude and Will saves against effects from aberrations. You also gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saves against  morph  or  polymorph  effects and Will saves against  mental  effects; this bonus increases to +2 against aberrations' morph, polymorph, or mental effects.

baseFeats.name: Aura of Righteousness
baseFeats.benefits: Your righteous aura dampens evil’s might.
baseFeats.text: Your righteous aura dampens evil’s might. You and all allies within 15 feet gain evil resistance 5.

baseFeats.name: Aura of Vengeance
baseFeats.benefits: When you call upon others to take retribution, you also guide their aim.
